reviewText: Corny but an OK insider look at bike racing.

This is more of a home-movie by a grown man who acts like an excited child.  I couldn't tell if it was more about him or the race.  Although the old footage of US Postal and Hincappe was a fun surprise.  The insider look at the velodrome and famous showers was cool.  The cost is a bit high for the armature footage.  It is entertaining.....

Let me start by saying I do realize the film is not about the race itself but I do think more footage of the race could have been included. It's advertised as featuring George Hincapie but in reality you really only see him fleetingly race by.
